full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): ` RTA MGRIN GSANG SGRUB MNGA' GSOL NI, ,LHA RGYAL SNYAN PA'I RNGA GSANG DANG, ,PAN CHEN BLO BZANG CHOS RGYAN GYIS, ,MDZAD PA'I BEGTZE'I MNGA' GSOL BZHUGS, , ` RTA MGRIN GSANG SGRUB KYI SMON LAM SHIS BRJOD BZHUGS SO,, ,,
